title: Cargill Meat Solutions Recalls Ground Beef Products due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 23, 2018Cargill Meat Solutions, a Fort Morgan, Colo. establishment, is recalling approximately 25,288 pounds of ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The ground beef items...
